class.name: RelatedFeatureEntity
class.comment: Table to store related feature information used in the OGC SOS 2.0 Capabilities (See also OGC SWES 2.0). Mapping file: sos/core/RelatedFeature.hbm.xml

column.name: related_feature_id
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: fk_feature_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related feature. Contains "feature".id

column.name: fk_role_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related relatedFeatureRole. Contains "related_feature_role".id

set.name: offerings
set.comment: Relation table to store relatedFeatures and their associated offerings.

column.name: fk_related_feature_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related relatedFeature. Contains "related_eature".id

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related offering. Contains "offering".id
